articles.title: 1 year ago, the first COVID-19 vaccines were administered in the US. Here's what has happened since - WTAE Pittsburgh
articles.description: Hundreds of millions of Americans have rolled up their sleeve to get vaccinated.
articles.content: It's been one year since the first COVID-19 vaccines were injected in December 2020. Among the first to receive a dose of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine was a critical care nurse in New York on Dec. 14.… [+10380 chars]
